```{r}
library(raster)
```

Bring in BARC raster.

```{r}
barc_9_24 <- raster("ca3966012280920200817_20200815_20200919_dnbr_barc256_utm.tif")
```

convert to unburned, low, mod, high.

```{r}
barc_unburned <- raster::reclassify(barc_9_24, c(0,73, 20, 72, 256, NA))

barc_low <- reclassify(barc_9_24, c(0,73, NA,73,113, 20, 113,256, NA))

barc_mod <- reclassify(barc_9_24, c(0,113,NA, 113, 198, 20, 198, 256, NA ))

barc_high <- reclassify(barc_9_24, c(0, 198, NA, 198, 256, 20))
```

```{r}
plot(barc_low)
```
